## Explore Dataset

## Mean and Median by group

```{r}
aggregate(weight ~ group, data = PlantGrowth, mean)
aggregate(weight ~ group, data = PlantGrowth, median)
```

## Boxplot
```{r}
boxplot(weight ~ group, data = PlantGrowth,
        main = "Plant Growth by Group",
        xlab = "Group", ylab = "Weight")
```
